References#

1

EX M Izhikevich. Simple model of spiking neurons. IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks, 14(6):1569–1572, 2003. URL: https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/1257420, doi:10.1109/TNN.2003.820440.

2

O Jensen, P Goel, N Kopell, M Pohja, R Hari, and B Ermentrout. On the human sensorimotor-cortex beta rhythm: sources and modeling. Neuroimage, 26(2):347–355, 6 2005. URL: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1053811905001060?via%3Dihub, doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2005.02.008.

Input-Dependent Frequency Modulation of Cortical Gamma Oscillations Shapes Spatial Synchronization and Enables Phase Coding. PLoS Computational Biology, 2015. URL: https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1004072, doi:10.1371/JOURNAL.PCBI.1004072.
